title: I'm not dead
body:
... just tired, and busy. More later.

Don't forget, local filmmakers, you have less than 2 weeks to submit your short films for Moxie Shorts 2006. If you don't turn one in, I will hunt you down and make you wish that you had. I have my ways.
author: Dan

comments.author: Al
comments.body: Counting oodles of cash, I assume?
